column2: U.S. FCC approves Altice purchase of Cablevision Systems WASHINGTON The U.S. Federal Communications Commission said late on Tuesday it had approved European telecoms group Altice NV's acquisition of U.S. cable company Cablevision Systems Corp in a $17.7 billion deal that includes assumption of debt.
